markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Legendary Monster Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=4904) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 162 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10); [Master Monster Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=4889)

</column>

---

Your knowledge of monsters is so incredible that it reveals glaring flaws in your prey. Your bonus from Monster Hunter (and the bonus from Monster Warden if you have it) increases from +1 to +2 for you and any allies who benefit.
name: Legendary Monster Hunter
prerequisite: Legendary in Nature; Master Monster Hunter
